00014 using namespace ldmx;

00016 static Process* p { 0 };
00017 
00018 static void softFinish (int sig, siginfo_t *siginfo, void *context) {
00019   if (p) p->requestFinish();
00020 }
00021

00035 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00036 
00037     if (argc < 2) {
00038         printf("Usage: ldmx-app [application arguments] {configuration_script.py} [arguments to configuration script]\n");
00039         return 0;
00040     }
00041 
00042     int ptrpy = 1;
00043     for (ptrpy = 1; ptrpy < argc; ptrpy++) {
00044         if (strstr(argv[ptrpy], ".py"))
00045             break;
00046     }
00047 
00048     if (ptrpy == argc) {
00049         printf("Usage: ldmx-app [application arguments] {configuration_script.py} [arguments to configuration script]\n");
00050         printf("  ** No python script provided. **\n");
00051         return 0;
00052     }
00053 
00054     try {
00055         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Loading configuration --------" << std::endl;
00056         ConfigurePython cfg(argv[ptrpy], argv + ptrpy + 1, argc - ptrpy);
00057         p = cfg.makeProcess();
00058         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Configuration load complete  --------" << std::endl;
00059 
00060     } catch (Exception& e) {
00061         std::cerr << "Framework Error [" << e.name() << "] : " << e.message() << std::endl;
00062         std::cerr << "  at " << e.module() << ":" << e.line() << " in " << e.function() << std::endl;
00063     }
00064 
00065     struct sigaction act;
00066  
00067     memset (&act, '\0', sizeof(act));
00068  
00069     /* Use the sa_sigaction field because the handles has two additional parameters */
00070     act.sa_sigaction = &softFinish;
00071  
00072     /* The SA_SIGINFO flag tells sigaction() to use the sa_sigaction field, not sa_handler. */
00073     act.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO;
00074  
00075     if (sigaction(SIGINT, &act, NULL) < 0) {
00076       perror ("sigaction");
00077       return 1;
00078     }
00079  
00080 
00081     try {   
00082         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Starting event processing --------" << std::endl;
00083         p->run();
00084         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Event processing complete  --------" << std::endl;
00085 
00086     } catch (Exception& e) {
00087         std::cerr << "Framework Error [" << e.name() << "] : " << e.message() << std::endl;
00088         std::cerr << "  at " << e.module() << ":" << e.line() << " in " << e.function() << std::endl;
00089     }
00090 
00091     return 0;
00092 }
